title: Palo Alto Battlefield National Historical Park: Curriculum Materials
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Curriculum Materials                Curriculum Materials       Palo Alto Battlefield is pleased to offer a variety of education resources to help students learn about the U.S.-Mexican War. We encourage you to use these resources to supplement field trips or to reinforce materials presented in the classroom.
